sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Memorable historick descriptiones draven [sic]. From the sacred bookes insert in the subsequent page. By Alexander Garden.. Garden, Alexander, 1585?-1634?
[119] p., [9+?] leaves of plates : ill., ports.
By Gerrit Moulert,, Prented at Middelburgh, : Anno 1637..
In verse. Device on t.p.: bird with spread wings holding a scroll in its beak , with motto below "Nil penna, sed usus"; initials. Error in register: F₅ numbered F₃. Imperfect: cropped, stained, with print show-through, and loss of text. Of the nine extant plates, four are torn, three of those mostly torn out, possibly some plates lacking entirely. Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
=======
Memorable historick descriptiones draven [sic]. From the sacred bookes insert in the subsequent page. By Alexander Garden.. Garden, Alexander, 1585?-1634?
[119] p., [9+?] leaves of plates : ill., ports.
By Gerrit Moulert,, Prented at Middelburgh, : Anno 1637..
In verse. Device on t.p.: bird with spread wings holding a scroll in its beak , with motto below "Nil penna, sed usus"; initials. Error in register: F₅ numbered F₃. Imperfect: cropped, stained, with print show-through, and loss of text. Of the nine extant plates, four are torn, three of those mostly torn out, possibly some plates lacking entirely. Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
Gerrit Moulert
